content.text:
Let's solve this block-building task step by step:

Analysis of Target Structure:
- 2 main structures are shown in the first image
- Colors: Green and Orange blocks
- Layers: Multiple layers for each structure
- Blocks come in different shapes: rectangular, cylindrical, triangular/sloped

Block Dictionary Analysis:
- Green blocks: Rectangular (index 1, 3, 5)
- Orange blocks: Cylindrical (index 7) and Triangular/Sloped (index 11, 15)

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (green rectangular)
    Step2: Move block with index 7 (orange cylindrical)
    Step3: Move block with index 1 (green rectangular)
    Step4: Move block with index 3 (green rectangular)
    Step5: Move block with index 7 (orange cylindrical)
    Step6: Move block with index 11 (orange triangular)
    Step7: Move block with index 3 (green rectangular)
    Step8: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular)
}

This sequence will recreate the two structures shown in the target image, using blocks exactly as they appear in the dictionary.
